title: Downtown Crepe Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Take-out, Catering, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Crepe cafe in downtown Kitchener near Charles St bus terminal. Makes food in-house. Soup of the day is always vegan as is the bread and garden salad. The gluten-free buckwheat crepe batter is vegan and can be used for: ratatouille vegetarian crepe (can ask to omit cheese); under the Tuscan sun crepe (substitute chickpeas for chicken); and in a few others with modification for vegans - ask. Staff is willing to accommodate. Has almond milk for coffee drinks.
